26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_engine_mpeg_nv50.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:32 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "priv.h"
30
31#include <core/gpuobj.h>
32#include <subdev/timer.h>
33
34#include <nvif/class.h>
35
36/*******************************************************************************
37 * PMPEG context
38 ******************************************************************************/
39
40static int
41nv50_mpeg_cclass_bind(struct nvkm_object *object, struct nvkm_gpuobj *parent,
42 int align, struct nvkm_gpuobj **pgpuobj)
43{
44 int ret = nvkm_gpuobj_new(object->engine->subdev.device, 128 * 4,
45 align, true, parent, pgpuobj);
46 if (ret == 0) {
47 nvkm_kmap(*pgpuobj);
48 nvkm_wo32(*pgpuobj, 0x70, 0x00801ec1);
49 nvkm_wo32(*pgpuobj, 0x7c, 0x0000037c);
50 nvkm_done(*pgpuobj);
51 }
52 return ret;
53}
54
55const struct nvkm_object_func
56nv50_mpeg_cclass = {
57 .bind = nv50_mpeg_cclass_bind,
58};
59
60/*******************************************************************************
61 * PMPEG engine/subdev functions
62 ******************************************************************************/
63
64void
65nv50_mpeg_intr(struct nvkm_engine *mpeg)
66{
67 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &mpeg->subdev;
68 struct nvkm_device *device = subdev->device;
69 u32 stat = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x00b100);
70 u32 type = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x00b230);
71 u32 mthd = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x00b234);
72 u32 data = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x00b238);
73 u32 show = stat;
74
75 if (stat & 0x01000000) {
76 /* happens on initial binding of the object */
77 if (type == 0x00000020 && mthd == 0x0000) {
78 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x00b308, 0x00000100);
79 show &= ~0x01000000;
80 }
81 }
82
83 if (show) {
84 nvkm_info(subdev, "%08x %08x %08x %08x\n",
85 stat, type, mthd, data);
86 }
87
88 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x00b100, stat);
89 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x00b230, 0x00000001);
90}
91
92int
93nv50_mpeg_init(struct nvkm_engine *mpeg)
94{
95 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &mpeg->subdev;
96 struct nvkm_device *device = subdev->device;
97
98 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x00b32c, 0x00000000);
99 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x00b314, 0x00000100);
100 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x00b0e0, 0x0000001a);
101
102 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x00b220, 0x00000044);
103 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x00b300, 0x00801ec1);
104 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x00b390, 0x00000000);
105 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x00b394, 0x00000000);
106 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x00b398, 0x00000000);
107 nvkm_mask(device, 0x00b32c, 0x00000001, 0x00000001);
108
109 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x00b100, 0xffffffff);
110 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x00b140, 0xffffffff);
111
112 if (nvkm_msec(device, 2000,
113 if (!(nvkm_rd32(device, 0x00b200) & 0x00000001))
114 break;
115 ) < 0) {
116 nvkm_error(subdev, "timeout %08x\n",
117 nvkm_rd32(device, 0x00b200));
118 return -EBUSY;
119 }
120
121 return 0;
122}
123
124static const struct nvkm_engine_func
125nv50_mpeg = {
126 .init = nv50_mpeg_init,
127 .intr = nv50_mpeg_intr,
128 .cclass = &nv50_mpeg_cclass,
129 .sclass = {
130 { -1, -1, NV31_MPEG, &nv31_mpeg_object },
131 {}
132 }
133};
134
135int
136nv50_mpeg_new(struct nvkm_device *device, int index, struct nvkm_engine **pmpeg)
137{
138 return nvkm_engine_new_(&nv50_mpeg, device, index, 0x00400002,
139 true, pmpeg);
140}
